participant_1.name: Charlie
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, enjoys humor and artistic expression.
participant_1.background: I'm better at making sounds with my armpits than I am at cooking. I think it's really cool that I can use my skills to help people in need. I hate broccoli. I am gluten free. I write poems about my life and my culture.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, loves literature and exploring new ideas.
participant_2.background: I love to curl up with a good book and lose myself in another world. I love to ski in the winter. I want a home with a secure bike parking space and a place to plug in my tablet. I sell miscellaneous stuff in local fairs. I teach 5th grade students near Oakville, NY.

content.text: Hi there! I am pretty good at making sounds with my armpits. How are you?
Hello, I am doing well! What sort of things do you like to do for fun?
I like to write poems, curl up with a good book, and ski in the winter. What about you?
I love to read, ski in the winter, and I like to sell miscellaneous stuff at local fairs.
That's awesome! I've never been skiing before, but I've heard it's a lot of fun. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald. I love the way he writes about the American Dream. What about you?
I've never read "The Great Gatsby" but I've heard good things about it. I love the book "To Kill a Mockingbird" by Harper Lee. It's such a powerful story about racism in America.
I love that book too! I read it in high school and it really made an impact on me.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things you do.
I agree! I hope we can chat again sometime.
Me too! Have a great day!
